I

improveCrops(int) - Method in class pa1.City
Add to crop yields the amount specified
improveCropYield(Player, City) - Method in class pa1.ministers.Economist
Economists get a bonus when doing crops improvements Crop improvement still costs 500 gold Crop is improved by 50 + round((intelligence + experience + leadership) * 0.2) If the player does not have enough gold, throw an exception Else decrease 500 golds from the player and improves crops by the calculated amount
improveCropYield(Player, City) - Method in class pa1.ministers.Minister
Improve the crop yields in a city Improve Crop yields by 50 for 500 golds If the player does not have enough gold, throw an exception Else decrease 500 golds from the player and improves crops by 50
intelligence - Variable in class pa1.ministers.Minister
 
invokeRandomEvent(double) - Method in class pa1.City
Invoke a random event at the end of turn.
isGameOver() - Method in class pa1.GameEngine
Determine if the game is over by checking if there is exactly one player with at least one city
isReady() - Method in class pa1.ministers.Minister
